value:
A country—no, a world in need of
rescue? A quest fit for the great
Ferdinand. Just leave it to me!

My father is the imperial prime
minister. I will both succeed and
exceed him.

Making the rounds yourself, I see!
Admirable, but...shouldn't you be
delegating, given your station?

Seems you've got a lot of unique
weaponry lying around here. Mind
giving me a tour of the armory?

Been doing a bit of conditioning,
so I can keep from losing my edge.
...Not that that's a real possibility.

I have been asked, in the name of
friendship, to deliver all the best
from $Nf!
Greatness awaits me.
The noble standard.
What?! ...Have I already peaked?

Hm! What curious new strength might
this grant...

I am Ferdinand von Aegir, heir to the
Empire's foremost house. Fret no
more. Your savior has arrived.

Have you need of me? Just point
me at a problem, and I will solve it!
Your orders never disappoint.$k$pYou know, I never thought I'd meet
anyone as great as myself... Yet here
I am, surrounded by Heroes!$k$pAnd who commands them but you!
Why, if you were emperor, I would
gladly swear my allegiance.$k$pAnd that's not hyperbole! Not one
bit! It's a promise.$k$pJoin with me, and together we can
drive ever onward and upward, to
the end of this war and beyond!
とりゃあ！
Now!
ぐあっ！
won't retreat!
The splendor of nobility!
I will not hold back!
Victory is assured.
You're wide open.
So shameful...
Haha
A white stallion, a red rose... Oh, I'm just listing things as noble as myself.
Please resist the urge to surprise me! Shock is not befitting a noble.
My father, Duke Aegir, is a proud leader of the Empire... A noble among nobles!
Have you any imported teas? Only the finest will do.
You are not a noble, but I daresay you would do well as one.
I must find a way to demonstrate my superiority...
I acknowlege yor abilities. I will not allow any harm to come to you!
Quite!
What now?
It begins!
